title: 游戏崩溃了，求大佬解决一下
author: pzm1147881727
txt_content:
WARNING: coremods are present:
  AppleCore (苹果核.jar)
  DLFMLCorePlugin (移动光源.jar)
  LoadingPlugin (嘎嘎嘎.jar)
  JechCore (有点卡的查东西中文拼音搜索.jar)
  CXLibraryCore (cxlibrary-1.12.1-1.6.1.jar)
  CorePlugin (超好看的字体，没有就看不懂神秘的字.jar)
  Do not report to Forge! Remove FoamFixAPI (or replace with FoamFixAPI-Lawful) and try again. (程序优化.jar)
  Inventory Tweaks Coremod (物品栏优化.jar)
  CTMCorePlugin (凿子前置.jar)
  OpenModsCorePlugin (开源前置.jar)
Contact their authors BEFORE contacting forge

// Why did you do that?

Time: 8/24/18 7:18 PM
崩溃类型： There was a severe problem during mod loading that has caused the game to fail

replies.txt_content: 删掉codechiken的配置，让他重新生成
